comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] I'd say that could well be him! Well done! Must be something wrong with my brain...couldn't for the life of me see the 'H' or the 'R'...or the 'd' (!)...at one point I was looking at a boxer whose nickname was 'Norkey' before deciding that was way off course...
